item.title: BalanceCheckMod.F90
item.description: Overview: Not done yet (only when we will add consumption water to the surface soil)

item.title: clm_driver.F90
item.description: General discussion: This module provides the main CTSM/CLM driver physics calling sequence. Most computations occurs over clumps of gridcells (and associated subgrid scale entities) assigned to each MPI process.

item.title: clm_instMod.F90
item.description: Overview: In the new module CTSM/src/biogeophys/SectorWaterMod.F90 we define a new type: sectorwater_type. In this module we create the instance of this object sectorwater_inst which later is used during the run.

item.title: clm_varctl.F90
item.description: Overview: This module contains the run control variables. To support sectoral water usage we add the sectorwater logic variable. The default value is .

item.title: clm_varpar.F90
item.description: Overview: Just added the capacity to access the sectorwater logical variable. Not sure is needed. Probably to delete in the future.

item.title: controlMod.F90
item.description: Overview: Here we add the logical entry sectorwater to the clm_inparm namelist group. We also mpi_bcast the sectorwater variable, so that its value can be accessed from anywhere.

item.title: Externals.cfg
item.description: General discussion: To add the sectoral water abstractions, changes were made to several components of the CESM model (see CTSM/Model Development for Sectoral Water Usage).

item.title: HydrologyNoDrainageMod.F90
item.description: Overview: This module contains the main subroutine to execute the calculation of soil and snow hydrology. But in addition to this here is also defined the CalcAndWithdrawIrrigationFluxes() subroutine which do the calculation of irrigation withdrawal fluxes and perform the withdrawal (including from groundwater).

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm.xml
item.description: General discussion: We saw previously in the namelist definition the new added variables which can be changed by the user to control the model.

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: General discussion: This script builds the namelists for land component of the CESM model (CTSM/CLM5). To support sectoral water usage we added two new subroutines: setup_logic_sectorwater() and setup_logic_sectorwater_parameters().

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: General discussion: In order to use the sectoral abstractions input data, the dataset should be pre-processed using a special toolset to prepare the surface dataset which will be used by the land component CTSM/CLM5 during the run.

item.title: namelist_definition_ctsm.xml
item.description: General discussion: When new parameterization is introduced in any Earth System Model, it is very common for the modeler to set some of parameters as user defined.

item.title: restFileMod.F90
item.description: Overview: Here we simply add to the global metadata the status of the logical flag corresponding to the sector water use (sectorwater).

item.title: SectorWaterMod.F90
item.description: General discussion: This is a new module developed to support the sectoral water abstractions. During the development, the code for this module was largely inspired from a similar existing module for irrigation (src/biogeophys/IrrigationMod.
